gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 118, Pistons 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Pistons, 118-110 to improve to 35-26, as they have now won five of their last six games. Jimmy Butler led Miami with 26 points, six rebounds, and eight assists as Bam Adebayo (18 points, seven rebounds) and Duncan Robinson (18 points, three rebounds, four assists) totaled 36 points. Cade Cunningham (23 points, eight assists) and Simone Fontecchio (22 points) led Detroit in the loss. Detroit moves to 9-52 with the loss.
